name: Akrasan Squire
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Bant's armies are primarily composed of members of the Mortar caste, loyal commoners who haven't yet earned a sigil.

name: Angel's Herald
oracle_text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a green creature, a white creature, and a blue creature: Search your library for a card named Empyrial Archangel and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Rigorous faith and belief are rewarded on occasion, and richly so.

name: Angelic Benediction
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"Even in single combat, I am never alone."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Angelsong
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.

name: Bant Battlemage
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "A night attack will be easy. We'll make an air raid over the Akrasan border. Just get me some flint to light the war torches."

name: Battlegrace Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

name: Cradle of Vitality
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each 1 life you gained.
flavor_text: Naya's trees grow tall and sturdy. Their foliage intertwines to form dewcups, rainwater pools where the elves gather to celebrate life.

name: Dispeller's Capsule
oracle_text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself."
—Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean

name: Elspeth, Knight-Errant
oracle_text: +1: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
+1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
−8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

name: Ethersworn Canonist
oracle_text: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.
flavor_text: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

name: Excommunicate
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Rebels and other malcontents forced into the ritual awake lost in Topa's vast savannahs. Those who find their way back return humble and repentant.

name: Guardians of Akrasa
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe."
—Elspeth

name: Gustrider Exuberant
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice Gustrider Exuberant: Creatures you control with power 5 or greater gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The elves claim the canopy. The nacatl claim the mountains. I suppose you think we ought to stay on the jungle floor?"

name: Invincible Hymn
oracle_text: Count the number of cards in your library. Your life total becomes that number.
flavor_text: Bantians believe those who are born into the highest caste and live a life of discipline and virtue can ascend to become angels.

name: Knight of the Skyward Eye
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.

name: Knight of the White Orchid
oracle_text: First strike

When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Both guide and guard on open plain.

name: Knight-Captain of Eos
oracle_text: When Knight-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
{W}, Sacrifice a Soldier: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: The strength of Bant's caste system is the unfailing loyalty of its meekest members.

name: Marble Chalice
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor_text: The cup was a gift from the sphinx Tameron, who hoped that those who drank from it would live long enough to decrypt the sphinxes' wisdom.

name: Metallurgeon
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact.
flavor_text: "By the time I got there, the heart had stopped. Fortunately, I was able to replace it with something better."

name: Oblivion Ring
oracle_text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: A circle of light and a word of confinement.

name: Ranger of Eos
oracle_text: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
flavor_text: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

name: Resounding Silence
oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature.
Cycling {5}{G}{W}{U} ({5}{G}{W}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Silence, exile up to two target attacking creatures.

name: Rockcaster Platoon
oracle_text: {4}{G}: Rockcaster Platoon deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
flavor_text:
"Aven bandits can be sly. You've got to fill the sky with boulders—and then seek cover immediately."
—Knight-Captain Wyhorn

name: Sanctum Gargoyle
oracle_text: Flying
When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

name: Scourglass
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Scourglass: Destroy all permanents except for artifacts and lands. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Soon I will sleep, eyes closing to a world tarnished with flesh, and then wake to a polished vision."
—Sharuum

name: Sighted-Caste Sorcerer
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}: Sighted-Caste Sorcerer gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

name: Sigiled Paladin
oracle_text: First strike
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Each sigil marks the recognition of a great deed and signifies a duty owed to the one who granted it.

name: Soul's Grace
oracle_text: You gain life equal to target creature's power.
flavor_text: An avatar he sculpts of fellowship and light.

name: Sunseed Nurturer
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may gain 2 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Sunseeders quest for areas of open sky. They train plowbeasts to beat back the dense jungle long enough to cultivate a crop.

name: Welkin Guide
oracle_text: Flying
When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those talons really dig into your skin, but it's better than being dropped."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Yoked Plowbeast
oracle_text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text:
"It is sacrilege to confine a gargantuan to the grinding of straight lines. I will pray that it remembers who is the master of this land."
—Syeena, elvish godtoucher

name: Call to Heel
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.
flavor_text: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

name: Cathartic Adept
oracle_text: {T}: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: "Forget. Only then will there be space for hope between the pain and fear."

name: Cloudheath Drake
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{W}: Cloudheath Drake gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: A permanent storm rages over the plain of Cloudheath, and drakes ride its currents—two reminders that some elements of Esper will not be controlled.

name: Coma Veil
oracle_text: Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Etherium does not know sleep. Only magic can teach it the resting state of cold steel.

name: Courier's Capsule
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Capsule: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: In ages past, Esper couriers bore messages written on ornate scrolls. The medium has grown more sophisticated, but the principle remains the same.

name: Covenant of Minds
oracle_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If they don't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.
flavor_text: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.

name: Dawnray Archer
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{W}, {T}: Dawnray Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Their shots are fired most often as signals—or at those who didn't get the message.

name: Esper Battlemage
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: She can heal the flesh, or exploit its many weaknesses.

name: Etherium Astrolabe
oracle_text: Flash
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Speculation is foolish when the tools of certainty are available."
—Cinna, vedalken consul

name: Etherium Sculptor
oracle_text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

name: Fatestitcher
oracle_text: {T}: You may tap or untap another target permanent.

Unearth {U} ({U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Filigree Sages
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Untap target artifact.
flavor_text: "We of the Sanctum Arcanum have pondered every word on every page of the Filigree Texts. If you can't say the same, don't bother speaking."

name: Gather Specimens
oracle_text: If a creature would enter the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, it enters the battlefield under your control instead.
flavor_text:
"It's free to do whatever it wants. I've merely told it what that is."
—Xorin, Architect of Will

name: Jhessian Lookout
flavor_text: She stands ready, always watchful, knowing that weeks of peace and serenity can be overturned by a single distant sail.

name: Kathari Screecher
oracle_text: Flying

Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Kederekt Leviathan
oracle_text: When Kederekt Leviathan enters the battlefield, return all other nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

Unearth {6}{U} ({6}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Master of Etherium
oracle_text: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

name: Memory Erosion
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text:
"The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Mindlock Orb
oracle_text: Players can't search libraries.
flavor_text: Rogue mechanists once rummaged through the wastes of the Tidehollow, constructing unauthorized golems to threaten the hegemony of the sphinxes. The orbs put a stop to that.

name: Outrider of Jhess
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: The island nation of Jhess is under constant siege from Valeron on the mainland. Riders traverse the coastline, always on the lookout for sails or aven.

name: Protomatter Powder
oracle_text: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Protomatter Powder: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"There is no such thing as scrap metal. All such material can be repaired with the proper bonding agent."
—Quennus, metallurgeon

name: Resounding Wave
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Cycling {5}{W}{U}{B} ({5}{W}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Wave, return two target permanents to their owners' hands.

name: Sharding Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.

name: Skill Borrower
oracle_text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.

As long as the top card of your library is an artifact or creature card, Skill Borrower has all activated abilities of that card. (If any of the abilities use that card's name, use this creature's name instead.)

name: Spell Snip
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text:
"Magic cast through a hand of flesh is just as weak as the flesh itself."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Sphinx's Herald
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a white creature, a blue creature, and a black creature: Search your library for a card named Sphinx Sovereign and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: He calls a riddle through the gaps of cloven clouds, hoping for an answer.

name: Steelclad Serpent
oracle_text: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.
flavor_text:
"From the highest towers to the deepest sea, all life must be touched by etherium."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Tezzeret the Seeker
oracle_text: +1: Untap up to two target artifacts.
−X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
−5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

name: Tortoise Formation
oracle_text: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: At sea, the Jhessian fleet strikes swiftly and decisively. On land, facing the elite cavalry of Valeron, its marines must rely on more cautious strategies.

name: Vectis Silencers
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Vectis Silencers gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)
flavor_text: Even on Esper, there are those who eschew the use of magic in favor of simpler methods.

name: Ad Nauseam
oracle_text: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You may repeat this process any number of times.
flavor_text: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.

name: Archdemon of Unx
oracle_text: Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a non-Zombie creature, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: The necropolis at Unx was once a living city, its streets untrodden by death.

name: Banewasp Affliction
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller loses life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text: The consuming undeath of Grixis terrifies the survivors of Vithia, but its fauna is just as fearsome.

name: Blister Beetle
oracle_text: When Blister Beetle enters the battlefield, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Warriors of the Rip Clan wear their beetle-acid scars proudly, even modifying clothing and armor to better display the trophy.

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

name: Corpse Connoisseur
oracle_text: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library.

Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Cunning Lethemancer
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.
flavor_text: "Give me your memories, and you will have release from the suffering they bring you."

name: Death Baron
oracle_text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
flavor_text: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

name: Deathgreeter
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "The bones of allies grant wisdom. The bones of enemies grant strength. The bones of dragons grant life eternal."

name: Demon's Herald
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a blue creature, a black creature, and a red creature: Search your library for a card named Prince of Thralls and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "May these deaths be the first of many."

name: Dreg Reaver
flavor_text:
"On our thirty-fourth day of digging, we unearthed a chamber that contained the intact remains of several species long extinct from Grixis. One in particular should make a fine siege engine . . . ."
—Last notes of Shungus Nod, fleshcrafter

name: Dregscape Zombie
oracle_text: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

name: Executioner's Capsule
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Glaze Fiend
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

name: Grixis Battlemage
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Vitals of Grixis who eschew undeath must scrape and scratch to retain their mortality. The result is a breed of inventive mages.

name: Immortal Coil
oracle_text: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Draw a card.
If damage would be dealt to you, prevent that damage. Exile a card from your graveyard for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When there are no cards in your graveyard, you lose the game.

name: Infest
oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather."
—Rannon, Vithian holdout

name: Onyx Goblet
oracle_text: {T}: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: The goblet was a gift from the sphinx Gorael, who hoped humans and vedalken would eventually destroy each other to acquire it, leaving all of Esper to her own kind.

name: Puppet Conjurer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Homunculus artifact creature token.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Homunculus.
flavor_text: He scowls at his imperfect creation, then crushes it to scrap. He salvages the etherium and begins anew.

name: Resounding Scream
oracle_text: Target player discards a card at random.
Cycling {5}{U}{B}{R} ({5}{U}{B}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Scream, target player discards two cards at random.

name: Salvage Titan
oracle_text: You may sacrifice three artifacts rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile three artifact cards from your graveyard: Return Salvage Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Scavenger Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.
flavor_text: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.

name: Shadowfeed
oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The future is a snake, devouring your life backwards through time. And when you die, believe me, it doesn't stop feeding."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Shore Snapper
oracle_text: {U}: Shore Snapper gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: Kathari, the sickly aven of Grixis, have learned that the corpses by the shoreline are more trap than treat.

name: Skeletal Kathari
oracle_text: Flying
{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Skeletal Kathari.
flavor_text: Undeath doesn't end the kathari's search for carrion; it only removes one corpse from the Dregscape.

name: Tar Fiend
oracle_text: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Tar Fiend enters the battlefield, target player discards a card for each creature it devoured.

name: Undead Leotau
oracle_text: {R}: Undead Leotau gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Vein Drinker
oracle_text: Flying
{R}, {T}: Vein Drinker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Vein Drinker.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vein Drinker this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vein Drinker.

name: Viscera Dragger
oracle_text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Bloodpyre Elemental
oracle_text: Sacrifice Bloodpyre Elemental: It deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: Elementals born of Jund are as cruel and unstable as the plane itself.

name: Bloodthorn Taunter
oracle_text: Haste
{T}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Naya's celebrants stoke the gargantuans into a rage, loosing a tide of muscle with the precision of an arrow.

name: Caldera Hellion
oracle_text: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Caldera Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature.

name: Crucible of Fire
oracle_text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.
flavor_text:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Dragon's Herald
oracle_text: {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a black creature, a red creature, and a green creature: Search your library for a card named Hellkite Overlord and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The penultimate step of the ritual involves bathing in a delicious glaze.

name: Exuberant Firestoker
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may have Exuberant Firestoker deal 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: The artistry of Etlan's firedancers is more spectacular when behemoths join in.

name: Flameblast Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Dragon lords of Jund rule by edicts of flame.

name: Goblin Assault
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
Goblin creatures attack each combat if able.
flavor_text: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit—a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.

name: Goblin Mountaineer
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Goblin lairs sit high in Jund's mountains. This gives the goblins easy access to the sacrificial peaks above and lets them build up a head of steam before attacking prey down below.

name: Hell's Thunder
oracle_text: Flying, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hell's Thunder.

Unearth {4}{R} ({4}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Hissing Iguanar
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Viashino thrashes keep iguanars as hunting companions, giving them wounded captives as playthings.

name: Incurable Ogre
flavor_text: Each mutation causes the incurables to look vastly different from one another. They are left with only one thing in common: their insatiable lust for the slaughter.

name: Jund Battlemage
oracle_text: {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.
{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: "Of your blood I will make my mead, an offering to the thirsty jungle."

name: Lightning Talons
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"This is going to hurt a lot, but on the bright side, you'll be dead soon."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Magma Spray
oracle_text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
"Jund is a wounded world. Beware its searing blood spilling out onto the surface."
—Rakka Mar

name: Predator Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, haste
Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: Dragons make for spiteful gods.

name: Resounding Thunder
oracle_text: Resounding Thunder deals 3 damage to any target.
Cycling {5}{B}{R}{G} ({5}{B}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Thunder, it deals 6 damage to any target.

name: Cavern Thoctar

name: Cylian Elf

name: Druid of the Anima

name: Elvish Visionary

name: Gift of the Gargantuan

name: Godtoucher

name: Jungle Weaver

name: Lush Growth

name: Mighty Emergence

name: Manaplasm

name: Mosstodon

name: Naturalize

name: Obelisk of Grixis

name: Obelisk of Naya

name: Crumbling Necropolis
oracle_text: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.
flavor_text:
"They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."
—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

name: Esper Panorama
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Esper Panorama: Search your library for a basic Plains, Island, or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Esper is an expansive canvas painted by precise, controlling hands.

name: Grixis Panorama
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Grixis Panorama: Search your library for a basic Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: There is no height above Grixis that is free from the stench of death.

name: Jund Panorama
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jund Panorama: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

name: Jungle Shrine
oracle_text: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.
flavor_text: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

name: Naya Panorama
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Naya Panorama: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest, or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Between the thunderous footfalls of Naya's behemoths lie moments of perfect quiet.

name: Savage Lands
oracle_text: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.
flavor_text: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

name: Seaside Citadel
oracle_text: Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.
flavor_text: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
